SimpleIVMode

ICipher
IMode
SimpleIVMode

SimpleIVMode

A convenience class that automatically places the IV at the beginning of the encrypted stream, so it doesn’t have to be handled explicitely.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.
